LAL_BUS_RESET_INFO Struct Reference
[Link Abstraction Layer]

#include <lalDefs.h>

Detailed Description

LAL bus reset information.


Data Fields

uint32 busGeneration
 number of bus resets seen since power-on
uint16 busId
 the local bus address
BOOL bValid
 indicates valid bus reset post-processing
uint32 currentTime
 the current cycle-time
uint32 irmAddr
 current IRM node address
uint32 nodeAddr
 thisNode address
uint32 numNodes
 number of nodes found on the bus
uint32 numSelfIDs
 number of self-id quadlets captured at last bus reset
uint32 rootAddr
 current root node address
QUADLET * SIDBundle
 pointer to the self-id quadlets
